action.description: The action to apply with the given offset.
action.markdownDescription: The action to apply with the given offset.

x.description: How much to offset the position on the x-axis.
x.markdownDescription: How much to offset the position on the x-axis.

y.description: How much to offset the position on the y-axis.
y.markdownDescription: How much to offset the position on the y-axis.

z.description: How much to offset the position on the z-axis.
z.markdownDescription: How much to offset the position on the z-axis.

type.description:
## Offset

---


[Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/offset)

Executes the provided [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/offset) at the position offset from the current position.

Type ID: `origins:offset`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_action": {
    "type": "origins:offset",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:add_block",
        "block": "minecraft:gravel"
    },
    "y": 1
}
```

This example will offset the position of the [Add Block (Block Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/offset) in the positive Y axis, raising the positional context of the block action to be 1 block above to where it initially was.
type.markdownDescription:
## Offset

---


[Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/offset)

Executes the provided [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/offset) at the position offset from the current position.

Type ID: `origins:offset`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_action": {
    "type": "origins:offset",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:add_block",
        "block": "minecraft:gravel"
    },
    "y": 1
}
```

This example will offset the position of the [Add Block (Block Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/offset) in the positive Y axis, raising the positional context of the block action to be 1 block above to where it initially was.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Offset (Block Action Type) date: 2021-04-05

Offset

Block Action Type

Executes the provided Block Action Type at the position offset from the current position.

Type ID: origins:offset

Fields

Field Type Default Description
action Block Action Type The action to apply with the given offset.
x Integer 0 How much to offset the position on the x-axis.
y Integer 0 How much to offset the position on the y-axis.
z Integer 0 How much to offset the position on the z-axis.

Examples

"block_action": {
    "type": "origins:offset",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:add_block",
        "block": "minecraft:gravel"
    },
    "y": 1
}

This example will offset the position of the Add Block (Block Action Type) in the positive Y axis, raising the positional context of the block action to be 1 block above to where it initially was.
